dt: {bc}a Jewish holiday beginning on the 14th of Nisan and commemorating the Hebrews' liberation from slavery in Egypt

et: from the exemption of the Israelites from the slaughter of the firstborn in Egypt (Exodus 12:23–27)
shortdef: a Jewish holiday beginning on the 14th of Nisan and commemorating the Hebrews' liberation from slavery in Egypt

dt: {bc}to pay no attention to the claims of {bc}{sx|disregard||}

shortdef: to pay no attention to the claims of : disregard
